text: Oleg Nikolayevich Perepelitsyn (; born 3 August 1969 in Kamyshin) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:People from Kamyshin Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Sodovik Sterlitamak players Category:Association football defenders
title: Oleg Perepelitsyn
